basics.name: Erik Gaal
basics.label: Full Stack Engineer
basics.summary: I'm Erik (he/him), a full stack engineer at Scrn a small digital agency based in Amsterdam, Netherlands. Projects I'm currently working on are almost anything web related to Eurovision and we're launching our first event accreditation platform Accredion soon.

work.summary: After the previous Lead Developer left to work for a different company, I naturally grew into the role of Lead Developer. I became responsible for all IT projects and infrastructure of the company and clients.

I joined the company to build a new SaaS platform for accreditation at events called Accredion. We worked with small team of two developers and two designers to build a product from scratch until running it in production for one of the largest events in the world, the Eurovision Song Contest.
Developed new features for the company in-house built CMS through data analytics and UX design which increased the bookers capacity required for the company to grow.

references.name: Raymond Klompsma
references.reference: Erik is a great guy. He worked almost two years at srprs.me while doing a full time study. He's reliable and really good in his job.

references.name: Tim Beglinger
references.reference: Erik helped srprs.me to solve difficult issues. Due to his full-stack capabilities, in thinking and in developing, the outcome of his work was of high quality. And although he worked part-time for srprs.me, he made sure he was full part of the team.
